pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Capture-Recapture (SCR) Methods Using 'nimble' // Provides utility functions, distributions, and methods for improving Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) sampling efficiency for ecological Spatial Capture-Recapture (SCR) and Open Population Spatial Capture-Recapture (OPSCR) models. The methods provided implement the techniques presented in "Estimation of Large-Scale Spatial Capture-Recapture Models" (Turek, et al (2020) doi:10.1101/2020.05.07.081182).
